and then i broke my joystick for ksp..

Just watched SE2 EP1 of you know what.

No I don't. What?

This is not relevant for KSP so moving this to the off-topic forum.

/Moderator

So how long before Paramount sues Hasbro for putting Q in their show?

(Seriously, I don't watch MLP, but someone linked me to the preview, and not only is he voiced by John deLancie, he's acting just like Q, and even has Q's teleportation visual effects...)

So how long before Paramount sues Hasbro for putting Q in their show?

(Seriously, I don't watch MLP, but someone linked me to the preview, and not only is he voiced by John deLancie, he's acting just like Q, and even has Q's teleportation visual effects...)

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
